question.title: Turing machine - binary subtraction
question.body:
Iâ€™m looking for a Turing machine in JFLAP (.jff format) that performs binary subtraction between two binary numbers. The machine must be implemented specifically as a Turing machine, not another automaton type.
If anyone can share an example or create one, I would really appreciate it.
Thank you!

question_comments.body: Welcome! When posting on Stack Overflow Q&A, you are expected to present your work, and point out what the problem is you encountered. There are several TM examples involving binary representations to be found on Stack Overflow, so please point out what the problem is you still have. The question has been closed.
